block_comment: This block of code manages the behavior of `TxUnderRun` based on clock events. On the rising edge of `MTxClk` or `Reset`, the code checks if a reset has occurred or if `BlockingTxStatusWrite_sync2` is true, in either case, it clears `TxUnderRun`. Otherwise, if `TxUnderRun_sync1` is true, it sets `TxUnderRun`. This process helps in managing underflow conditions in a transmit buffer depending upon different scenarios.
